custom_css: .button {display: inline-block; text-align: center; background-color: #222; color: #fff; /* Initial foreground color */ font-weight: bold; padding: 10px 15px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 20px; transition: background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease; max-width: 300px; margin: 20px auto; cursor: pointer;}
.button:hover {background-color: #fff; /* Change background color on hover */ color: #000; /* Change foreground color on hover */}
